Detailed Description

Definition at line 6 of file RegularizeTransform.hh.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

libpg::RegularizeTransform::RegularizeTransform ( Controller *  c,
double  penalty 
)

Implements Tikhonov style regularisation, either in an online step, or batch step. Regularizer gradient for is -q Should be able to sit anywhere in the controller stack since it uses the reduce and scatter commands for the params only.
